list_of_reviews.review_title: Unable to use my money despite proving to them it is lawful
list_of_reviews.review: I was using bitget normally, but my card stopped being accepted so tried using a different card, that also didn't work. After trying different methods of payments for over two hours, I get a huge questionnaire to upload bank statements, pictures, ID cards... around 15-20 questions. After completing it and proving my legitimate use of this app, they still require prove of the transaction certificate of the person I am sending the money to. This is their private information, and if there is an issue with them, you should be contacting them, not keeping my money hostage. This is not a way to make my account more secure, this is a way to SCAM me and keep my money. I am very new to this, and I am only learning. I am not dealing with huge amounts of cash, I am just learning the crypto world. Stop SCAMMING people and let them use their own money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They froze my funds for reasons unknown.
list_of_reviews.review: They froze my funds for reasons unknown and then have not repaid me within the 1-3 days. They have taken £1000, with no way to contact customer service. I do not recommend using this app.
Stay away! Marshallswithpartners.com pretending to be TJX are scamming people using this app.Clearly, the app doesn't care by facilitating a platform for crime.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have been over 6 months already trade…
list_of_reviews.review: I have been over 6 months already trade in bitget.. i like their futures.. the system like mt4 trader, can buy and sell.. Deposit and withdraw smoothly..

list_of_reviews.review_title: So Bitget are offering some rewards for…
list_of_reviews.review: So Bitget are offering some rewards for trading. One of the rewards is some apple airpods max valued at $800, yet they retail at $464.99.

Withdrawing fiat as a new member is a hassle. You're limited to three currencies and must first deposit, requiring extra details like bank statements. Outsourced tech support isn't aware of the outdated or irrelevant FAQs. Also, be cautious, as they employ various strategies as a market maker to work against their clients who ytafe woth leverage, including those in futures and similar markets.

I've been on few exchanges to know that they're good at providing earning products to her users, earning in a passive manner. I'm one of the beneficiary of smart trend that guarantees the principal used not to talk of the smart portfolio bot.It's just that their customer support needs to be improved for a much better experience in my humble suggestion.

never use. very lazy customer service, no help whatsoever. pretty sure they faciliate scammers to use this platform. no help received to recover funds or simply investigate when i was subject to a scam.

Finally after almost 6months bitget froze my account, restrictions were lifted yesterday MARCH 30th 2024. I successfully removed all my funds from bitget, maybe because i threatened to file a lawsuit against them, it was nice doing business with you. GOOD BYE..

Very lazy stuff... I'm not sure, that they are really nice for crypto trading, and the rate just confirms my feelings. Their customer support were extremely bad. One of the worst experience on crypto market next 5 years for me.

list_of_reviews.review_title: terrible customer service and not secure
list_of_reviews.review: This app its not secure and its untrusted! Someone was trying to use my account, I noticed some activities that were not mine in my account, so I reported, but stupid me I reported before withdrawing my money from it, they obviously block my account, and after I did all the changes they request me to do it to unblock it, in additional a LIVE video from zoom with the team, and months later my account still BLOCKED, and they are again asking the same things I already did and ANOTHER VIDEO! Its just absurd, obviuosly they don't want me to close the account, because this is the only reason why I want to withdraw the money. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

The fact that they have Messi as their Ambassador doesn't make them a secure company and they're definitely not transparent. Even if the company is legit, they're more of a scam. A hidden scam though. The fact that they stop withdrawals when they want to, until they want to, without giving a specific date, that's already a scam to me. No wonder they're not available in US, UK and Canada.

list_of_reviews.review_title: When ever I buy suddenly price goes up…
list_of_reviews.review: When ever I buy suddenly price goes up 0.5-1% after I click buy and the again comes back in a secAnd eventually my order is placed at a higher price Response to bitget reply:I’ve used binance and other platforms but comparing that bitget have a glitch in it that prices are not updated by sec instead every 10-20sec my system and wifi is all ok as I also use other platforms but bitget have problems 90% of time

They have frozen my account. I have provided them with all the paperwork as well as screenshots etc of my work and I still don't have a resolution or any idea why my account is frozen. Customer service is a Robot and when a 'human' does pick up the enquiry they say its is resolved and the ticket is closed!! I am new to trading but the whole experience with this lot leaves a lot to be desired!! I just want my funds out of the account now.

BITGET is the WORST exchangeThey hold your funds - when you deposit CC they give ZERO accountability They let a test transaction go. but not the bulk and they are being silent not even answering no details nothing, they refuse to tell me what happened to my fundsThese guys are TERRIBLE THIEFS!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Never had such a bad experience with an exchange!
list_of_reviews.review: Never had such a bad experience with an exchange.Registration was cumbersome.Depositing fiat was not possible due to the fact that BANXA could not handle iDeal. Of which the claimed they could.After transferring TRX they FROZE my account for an unknown reason?I cannot login and therefore cannot use their support chat!After opening a support ticket it takes them forever to respond. Account still FROZENTHEY MESSED UP MY MAIN REASON FOR USING THEM BY IGNORING THE REFERRAL CODE I REGISTERED WITH.THE RERERAL IS OF VITAL IMPORTANCE TO ME.THEY SAY THEY CANNOT CHANGE THE REFERRAL WHICH THEY DIT NOT USE AFTER ALL! I WANT THE MONEY BACK THAT I TRANFERRED THEY ARE SITTING ON IT! THEY STOLE IT!

Pure Scam. They promise you to make money. You can invest as much as you want without any verification and check/control. Then, if you want to withdraw only a part, they block you. It means you can’t access your money you invested. Not only about profits, even not your initial funds. After they tell you that you wan in a reward some thousands of dollars, in my case over 300’000. But they ask first to pay 50’000 to the access to your funds and then also the reward of 300’000. Guess what happens if you pay 50’000. Nothing. Maybe another excuse for another fee to pay to get access to what belongs to you. Absolutely fraudulent if a platform blocks access to your funds you paid and invested.

Restricted for transfers, giving no reason and only postponing the end of reviewing my transactions, although there are only few of them. At first they promised to solve within 15 days, but now already month has gone, and all they write is "we still reviewing,  please wait ". Don't use this exchange!

I joined Bitget recently and ended up losing two positions by using their BOT which had a flaw in the Stop Loss setting. Despite following their Support's directions to maintain said positions which ended up getting liquidated a day later, they refused to compensate my position based on my Stop Loss which did not automatically terminate the position as intended, even though on multiple replies that they've acknowledged an issue with their setting and is currently undergoing changes. Also, despite having a transcript of the dialogue that clearly documented their instructions, their Support first denied the existence of said conversation, but later simply ignored the fact when I referred to the dialogue and simply blamed the losses on the customer saying I couldn't closed it myself any time. Then my request to have the case referred to a senior manager was also ignored, and all I received were cut-n-paste scripts by their low level Support staff that was abrupt and unhelpful. Finally, even though my losses is equivalent to probably less than a minute of their trading fees, and much less than free bonuses that they give out to new customers, which I suggested that they can use on my case since I'm also a new joiner, they simply refused and again use their copy/paste script on their replies. I've realized that Bitget is only interested in taking new users' funds for their own gains and provides zero support even when the issue lies with their platform. Moreover, they put flaky tools/products on their platform for unknowing customers to use that will jeopardize their funds, only to later blame the user. Be warned!!!
They took all my money,  i cant even withdraw my money back not to be trusted.

For whatever reason, my husband cannot log into his account! Not on his mobile or computer! We've not heard from customer service! And wondering what is happening? Is there a ban in the UK? or are they stealing our money like all these comments I've read suggests?

First time l used them.I passed the verification process.Initially l was able to do transactions & they had no issues with me depositing but then when l tried to withdraw, Bam! They freeze my account & tell me l need to be reverified again.Interesting that this happens after l make my largest deposit. I fill out a torturously long questionnaire that wants my tax info, bank statements, employment information, etc. etc. plus a letter assuming all accountability for transactions. I send it in & have spent 3 days trying to get confirmation of receipt. Meanwhile they have my USD & despite my asking for updates, no response. Lousy UX & zero sign of customer service.They are scam artists, if you put your money in, they’ll find a way to keep it.

I've been on few exchanges to know that they're good at providing earning products to her users, earning in a passive manner. I'm one of the beneficiary of smart trend that guarantees the principal used not to talk of the smart portfolio bot.It's just that their customer support needs to be improved for a much better experience in my humble suggestion.
ABSOLUTE SCAM SITE - AVOID!! - Took my money and froze funds so i can't transfer out of my assets or buy any coins - just avoid guys.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitget Wallet stole my funds of 1600…
list_of_reviews.review: The bitget virtual currency wallet platform is a big scam. The first time I transferred money to this platform, my funds were transferred away without my consent. I wrote many emails to inform the other party, and each time the other party responded by asking me to provide the transaction ID and wallet address. Then I went to their community to find their community staff to tell them about what happened to me, and their community staff directly banned me. I changed my identity and went into the community to complain, but was banned again. Recently, the bitget wallet suddenly sent me an email to respond that the bitget wallet would not compensate my losses, and the reason was that  Maybe I leaked my private password, or other unknown problems led to my fund loss. I would like to ask your platform, why didn’t you steal my money? In addition to you, who else has the ability to make my money disappear within an hour of my first transfer to your platform? I don’t believe anyone would pay attention to an account that has no previous transaction records, and no one has the ability to steal my funds as soon as they are transferred to your platform without any previous transaction records. So it is more likely that your platform stole my $1,600 in virtual currency, or it was one of your insiders.

Finally after almost 6months bitget froze my account, restrictions were lifted yesterday MARCH 30th 2024. I successfully removed all my funds from bitget, maybe because i threatened to file a lawsuit against them, it was nice doing business with you. GOOD BYE..

For whatever reason, my husband cannot log into his account! Not on his mobile or computer! We've not heard from customer service! And wondering what is happening? Is there a ban in the UK? or are they stealing our money like all these comments I've read suggests?

First time l used them.I passed the verification process.Initially l was able to do transactions & they had no issues with me depositing but then when l tried to withdraw, Bam! They freeze my account & tell me l need to be reverified again.Interesting that this happens after l make my largest deposit. I fill out a torturously long questionnaire that wants my tax info, bank statements, employment information, etc. etc. plus a letter assuming all accountability for transactions. I send it in & have spent 3 days trying to get confirmation of receipt. Meanwhile they have my USD & despite my asking for updates, no response. Lousy UX & zero sign of customer service.They are scam artists, if you put your money in, they’ll find a way to keep it.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitget Wallet stole my funds of 1600…
list_of_reviews.review: The bitget virtual currency wallet platform is a big scam. The first time I transferred money to this platform, my funds were transferred away without my consent. I wrote many emails to inform the other party, and each time the other party responded by asking me to provide the transaction ID and wallet address. Then I went to their community to find their community staff to tell them about what happened to me, and their community staff directly banned me. I changed my identity and went into the community to complain, but was banned again. Recently, the bitget wallet suddenly sent me an email to respond that the bitget wallet would not compensate my losses, and the reason was that  Maybe I leaked my private password, or other unknown problems led to my fund loss. I would like to ask your platform, why didn’t you steal my money? In addition to you, who else has the ability to make my money disappear within an hour of my first transfer to your platform? I don’t believe anyone would pay attention to an account that has no previous transaction records, and no one has the ability to steal my funds as soon as they are transferred to your platform without any previous transaction records. So it is more likely that your platform stole my $1,600 in virtual currency, or it was one of your insiders.

Finally after almost 6months bitget froze my account, restrictions were lifted yesterday MARCH 30th 2024. I successfully removed all my funds from bitget, maybe because i threatened to file a lawsuit against them, it was nice doing business with you. GOOD BYE..

With diverse coins and strong security (also the highest PoR rate among cexs), it's a user-friendly platform that encourages new traders to dive into crypto confidently.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for bitget.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common areas of concern for bitget.com include "account closures," "support issues," "unpredictable deductions," and "poor customer support." Praise focuses on "trustworthiness," "reasonable fees," "user-friendly interface," "transparency," "compliance," and "security."

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 2.6 (calculated from ratings: 5, 1, 1, 1, 5). With three out of five reviews being very negative (1-star), general user satisfaction appears low despite some positive feedback.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Recent reviews show significant dissatisfaction due to unpredictable deductions, poor customer support, and arbitrary account closures, despite some praise for transparency, compliance, and security. General user satisfaction is low.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight transparency, compliance, security, and responsive support, while negative reviews focus on service delays, unpredictable deductions, poor customer support, and arbitrary account closures. Key differentiators are reliability and customer service quality.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the bitget.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Customer support interactions on bitget.com are inconsistent, with some users praising quick responses within 24 hours, while others criticize unresolved issues and arbitrary account closures, indicating mixed effectiveness and responsiveness.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a significant dissatisfaction among users, with an average rating of 2 and three out of four reviews being very negative. Critical issues include service delays, unpredictable deductions, poor customer support, and arbitrary account closures, which contribute to the low user satisfaction. Positive feedback highlights the platform's transparency, compliance, security, and responsive support, indicating these are areas where the platform performs well. The key differentiators for the platform are its reliability and quality of customer service, which are currently perceived as lacking. To improve, the platform should focus on enhancing customer support, ensuring predictable and transparent fee structures, and addressing the concerns around arbitrary account closures.

First time l used them.I passed the verification process.Initially l was able to do transactions & they had no issues with me depositing but then when l tried to withdraw, Bam! list_of_reviews.review: Do not use bitget. My first problem was when I was trying to withdraw some ltc to an external wallet. The app said it was ‘processing’ the withdrawal but I never received anything. I had to constantly go back and forth with the appalling support to try and get my very own funds and eventually got it sorted after over 24 hours for a process that should’ve taken 10 mins max!! Now for the next problem, I bought £850 worth of btc, and when I tried to withdraw it, it said that my account was frozen and to contact support! And upon doing so I was told I would get an email back on the issue within 48 hours. Once I got this email, they were asking for details of the receiver and the purpose of one of my transactions from months ago for a mere 15 usdt. I told them that I was sending it to a friend to pay them back, then they asked me for some sort of proof of debt which is absolutely none of their business!!! I told them that I couldn’t provide as it was months ago and I got a new phone and on top of that, most of our conversations are face to face in real life, then I got an email saying that my account will be restricted and my hard earned money locked while they do an account review for a whopping 15 DAYS!!! Absolutely appalling, please I’m telling you, stay far far away from this exchange and never use this useless app!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My partner fell victim to a scam while…
list_of_reviews.review: My partner fell victim to a scam while looking after kids at home. They initially gave her $400 credit, which quickly turned into $2,000. After returning that amount, they provided $2,000, which was then converted to $4,000, and the cycle continued. They gave her an app resembling Kogan, a fake website with bogus targets to make it seem like she was working for a legitimate company. Some women, acting as mentors, were also part of this scam, including someone named Sandygate, who pressured her into participating. Unfortunately, we lost nearly 14,000 AUD in this scam. Please stay vigilant and report such incidents to your nearest police authorities.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My partner fell victim to a scam while…
list_of_reviews.review: My partner fell victim to a scam while looking after kids at home. They initially gave her $400 credit, which quickly turned into $2,000. After returning that amount, they provided $2,000, which was then converted to $4,000, and the cycle continued. They gave her an app resembling Kogan, a fake website with bogus targets to make it seem like she was working for a legitimate company. Some women, acting as mentors, were also part of this scam, including someone named Sandygate, who pressured her into participating. Unfortunately, we lost nearly 14,000 AUD in this scam. Please stay vigilant and report such incidents to your nearest police authorities.

It is a garbage. I contacted customer support to provide me wallet address. They replied immediately but when I change my mind to not invest in it. I started withdrawal request. My total amount was 271 USD, the system message poped up, stating that I can only withdraw 221 USD and my question was who will take 50 USD for nothing? Still I requested 221 USD to withdraw and is pending since some days. When I contact Customer Support Team to process my withdrawal request asap. list_of_reviews.review_title: Please be advised that your platform is…
list_of_reviews.review: Please be advised that your platform is being used by scammers to get money from innocent people trying to make money to better their lives. It's a pity I can't get back my money. Please be vigilant on the same.

Bitget has several fake setups and one of them is through WhatsApp. It has an agent calling himself Professor Thompson (fake) with his Assistance Gianna (fake) who lure unsuspecting crypto investors to invest with Bitget and copy trades using the professor's signals. In the process, they convince traders to invest more and for those who fall for this scam,  they never see their money again. They get locked out of their Bitget accounts and Gianna and the professor tell them to deposit more funds in order for Bitget to unlock their accounts. There is no way they can contact support for help. My niece was the latest victim. Be warned!
Mobile app updates on Bitget are timely but could bring more improvements.
The fees are competitive but the user interface could be more visually appealing.

Worst customer support experience ever. I have calculated my profits and it doesn’t fit with what i have in my account. I have about 40 % less than what i should have. I keep getting different answers to why, first they tell me the total profit is without funding fees. Then i want them to send me list of funding fees and then i find out that the total profit i can see is including funding fees. I am making a nice profit but i am missing some of it and i want to understand if i can count on the total profit or not. Because 40 % less is not a small percentage that’s a LOT. Everytime i get an answer on the mail it’s by a new person and we just go around in a loop we are going nowhere. I 1 person to seriously help me out and figure this out and i will change my 1 star to 5. This is not acceptable behaviour by a company as yours. 7054486209 Should be a number you can search on the system for my case or something.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitget Has the worst P2P Appeal Customer Support
list_of_reviews.review: I have waited for more than 3 days for my appeal to be solved. Why is customer support not responding or communicating? There has been zero communication from Customer support even with all the evidence.Look up on it Bitget on  Order No : 1216962776481189889

I live in Germany and recently opened an account with Bitget, though I had been using another centralized exchange for years without any issues. To reduce the risk associated with centralized exchanges, I decided to split my funds between Bitget and my previous exchange, thinking it would be safer in case one of them went bankrupt.Unfortunately, this turned out to be a very bad decision. A few weeks after opening my account, Bitget froze it without any explanation. It has now been over a week, and customer service keeps telling me they cannot disclose the reason, asking me to wait. I also had USDT in my account, which I intended to use to buy some cryptocurrencies, but now I can’t do anything because my account has been restricted for no apparent reason. I am confident I haven’t done anything wrong.I initially thought Bitget was a reliable centralized exchange, but based on my experience, it’s proven to be the opposite. My friends use various other centralized exchanges, and none of them have had this kind of problem.

list_of_reviews.review: This is categorically and unequivocally an untrustworthy exchange, stay away at all costs. They listed a token which was the subject of a hack, the token was moved to a different chain and redistributed, after months of silence Bitget finally said they would remunerate holders with new tokens and support redistribution. This was a lie, they dragged it out for months again, then put out a statement passing their 'dear and valued customers' (A total lie) onto a third party, linking customers from their website to a Telegram account. This telegram account asked me to send them the tokens (Which I didn't want to do, but at this point was left with no other option), after sending the tokens the team promised to send me my tokens in a few days, its now been weeks, they've stopped replying to my messages and clearly aren't going to remunerate me. Bitget's customer service are absolutely useless, they pass you from email to live chat and back and forth in an endless loop. This exchange is unscrupulous, untrustworthy and unprofessional.

What can I say? My experience with this platform has been frustrating. Once you make a deposit, it feels like you're trapped. The gas fees are extraordinarily high, making withdrawals nearly impossible. I wouldn't recommend this platform to anyone, not even my worst enemy.Their support team often responds with apologies, but I know they won’t make any changes. They claim gas fees are influenced by the market and validators, but I’ve compared multiple platforms and time zones, and the fees here are consistently higher. I won’t be contacting them about my withdrawal, as I don’t expect any resolution.
Bitget is reliable. I’ve withdrawn funds multiple times without any issues. It gives me peace of mind when it comes to my crypto assets.
Haven't had any major issues with Bitget. It does what it promises, nothing more, nothing less.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I honestly do not know the way forward…
list_of_reviews.review: I honestly do not know the way forward from this. Every of my efforts to make this work has proved abortive. I have been trying to bind my bitget wallet to my bitget exchange so I can get verified. But each time I try to do it, I keep getting that my password is incorrect, but that is the same password I used. I also tried to create a new account and I keep getting “your account is susceptible to high risk, please contact customer support”, of which I tried to, but that also proved abortive. I also asked someone to help open an account from their end and see if it would work. The person was able to open a new account, but when it was time to login, he was getting the “incorrect password” prompt. Please, you guys should do something about it. I have a little asset in the wallet and the wallet is also connected to some of my airdrops. So please do something about it.My uid is : 9b10778d63b086947bf3db795badc9cdThank you
